creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: various imagery; standing man with bare hairy chest at left; silhouette of horse's head in ULC with the word "BOXING" vertically at left edge; large boxing glove at right; silhouette of cockroach at bottom center; silhouette of figure in boxing ring in LRC
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
title: Pugilist
